settings.text:
We’ll try to answer all of your questions below, but if we are unsuccessful, please do not hesitate to reach out to us on the mail below.

Borgervænget 14, 1sal
5000, Odense C, Denmark
info@twelve-inch.com

settings.heading: Where can I buy your products?
settings.row_content: You can buy them directly on our web-shop on this site, on most Amazon market places and in some brick and mortar record shops.

settings.heading: How does your product work?
settings.row_content: Our products use magnetism and clever design to secure your records to the wall. The magnetic component is secured to the wall with a screw and looks like a black disc. A large 12” disc looking like a vinyl record with a metal disc fitted in the middle is then inserted into your record, thus creating a magnetic attraction.  If you want to wall mount your vinyl records, with it’s cover on, you will have to use the Twelve Inch Original. If you wish to mount only the vinyl record itself, you should use the Twelve Inch Adapter.
